>Back from BruCon

26 Sep 2010


Yeah, my first ever hacker-con (Infosec doesn't count). Saw an awful lot of good talks from various people and a couple of good workshops to boot. Props to the Brucon guys, samy.pl and digininja for some great talks and training. Also, it being held in Belgium, the beer was good too!

Generally, there was a lot of talk around RFID which was interesting but I don't quite see it going anywhere special just yet (especially the near field stuff) and a fair bit on XSS and similar, along with Web Application Firewalls and similar. A good selection of topics and a lot of fun.
